feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX][HostedPrivateCloud] - Upgrade Storage Equipment
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 17, 08:00 - 11:00 UTC

Jul 28, 22:27 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/08/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 17/08/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Storage equipments will be unavailable for 3 hours.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade some of our storage equipment.

entry.title: [BHS][VMware Private Cloud] - Storage tete-955
entry.content:
Jul 29, 08:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 29/07/2023 05:34 UTC
End Time : 29/07/2023 08:40 UTC
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 29, 06:47 UTC
Identified - Start time: 29/07/2023 05:34 UTC
Technical impact : datastore pcc-002998 was unreachable
Root cause : Hardware issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable
entry.content:
Jul 26, 19:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 26/07/2023 14:50 UTC
End Time : 26/07/2023 19:06 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2C
Root cause : A fault in a module of the cooling system is at the root of this incident.
All the affected servers are back to normal.

Jul 26, 16:59 UTC
Update - All the hosts affected on the R806R16 rack are operational again, and our teams are working on the others.

Jul 26, 16:10 UTC
Identified - A fault in a module of the cooling system is at the root of this incident, and a corrective fix is currently being implemented.

Jul 26, 15:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/07/2023 14:50 UTC
Service impact : Servers on racks R806R16, R806R17 and R806R18 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
